author: Staff Reporter
text:
The women’s wing of Tirupur Kerala Club have distributed kits containing food items to 75 women who were admitted to the delivery ward of the District Headquarters hospital here.

S. Bhavani who delivered a girl child on World Women’s day was given a cradle, and the hospital was given apparatuses to check blood pressure.

Sheeja Murali, the chairperson of the women’s wing, told reporters that the kit contained organic health mixes, date syrup, biscuits, bread and baby dresses.

The mothers of the new born were given energy drinks.

Priya Viswasam, the chief surgeon (paediatrics) at the hospital, spoke on healthcare procedures that needed to be followed by mothers after delivery.

The club pasted posters on the hospital campus to educate the women on breast feeding, exercises and diet during pregnancy and after delivery.
title: Cradle presented to girl born on women’s day
